com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan

Interface PlanManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DecommissionPlanManager, DefaultPlanManager, DefaultRecoveryPlanManager

    public interface PlanManager
    PlanManager is the management interface for Plans. Its main purpose is to apply Strategy objects to Elements.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Determines the next Steps that should be considered for scheduling.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlan

        Plan getPlan()
        Returns:
        the Plan being managed by this instance

      • setPlan

        void setPlan(Plan plan)
        Sets the plan for the PlanManager.

      • getCandidates

        java.util.Collection<? extends Step> getCandidates(java.util.Collection<PodInstanceRequirement> dirtyAssets)
        Determines the next Steps that should be considered for scheduling. Steps that are being selected by other PlanManagers are provided as dirtyAssets as a hint to this PlanManager to assist with scheduling.
        Parameters:
        dirtyAssets - Other Steps/assets that are already claimed for scheduling elsewhere
        Returns:
        One or more Steps that can be scheduled or an empty Collection when there is no Step to schedule, which may happen if for example all incomplete Steps are already being worked on by other PlanManagers

      • update

        void update(TaskStatus status)
        Notifies constituent elements of TaskStatus updates.
        Parameters:
        status - A TaskStatus from Mesos.

      • getDirtyAssets

        java.util.Set<PodInstanceRequirement> getDirtyAssets()
        Returns a Set of assets that are dirty, i.e. being worked upon by the Plan that this PlanManager is working on.
        Returns:
        A Set containing assets that are dirty
